name: ‘Scenery on Dano Day‘
description: This is Remake of „‘Scenery on Dano Day‘ by Korean painter Sin Yun Bok“  Sin Yun Bok (1758–1813) was famous for painting women and in this painting, a group of gisaeng entertainers are bathing and washing their hair in a mountain stream. Dano has always been a day of decorations, a day to enjoy the summer. People would wash and put on new sets of clothes and there was a whole range of “Dano decorations”. 1920x1920, motion & sound, mp4
